text: Baaxol Rooci leemik mutuccu ittam matanaay Haadaytuy isi Namma galit Qaraanal Haada mayan usun sin innaah Yalli gine gino akke waytek, hebeltoh iimiy cabneeh kak garcitne (karcitne) mannu lawcal macfuuzul nuktube nee akke waytek, tohuk lakal gino inkih sinni Rabbi fan gaaboysimta Qhiyaamah ayr√≥ cisab kee galtoh
